name: Doomsday Fishing
description:
With the gates of Oblivion opening up all over Tamriel and daedra pouring through them, the sky is often blood-red.  As stressful as that may be, sometimes getting away from it all is for the best. Fishing is one way of doing that . . .



An Oblivion-inspired game.

Attributions:

Water - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/images/175650

Sky - https://www.imperial-library.info/content/allies-bruma

Oblivion and Daggerfall Slaughter Fish -  https://www.imperial-library.info/content/creatures

Red Fish and Blue Fish - https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Fish

Wood Texture - https://www.pinterest.com/niklashell18/stylized-wood/ 

Font - https://www.fontspace.com/a-charming-font-f3989

Background Music -
